title: Learning Management System
description: A PHP based LMS for schools and colleges, featuring online course materials, attendance tracking, and more.

title: GitHub Insights Website
description: A React based website to search for GitHub users and view their repositories and followers via Github APIs.

title: Jobs APIs
description: A Node.js based RESTful API for job listings and applications.

title: Cocktails Catalogue
description: A React based website to search for cocktails and view their recipes via TheCocktailDB APIs.
